pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatially Smoothed MRCD Estimator // Estimation of the Spatially Smoothed Minimum Regularized Determinant (ssMRCD) estimator and its usage in an ssMRCD-based outlier detection method as described in Puchhammer and Filzmoser (2023) doi:10.1080/10618600.2023.2277875 and for sparse robust PCA for multi-source data described in Puchhammer, Wilms and Filzmoser (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2407.16299. Included are also complementary visualization and parameter tuning tools.
